channel.title: find on SoCal Ranch - a (sub)urban ranching experiment in organic and digital life
channel.description: Recent content in find on SoCal Ranch - a (sub)urban ranching experiment in organic and digital life

item.title: Show filename and linenumber
item.description: When searching for files in a bash shell, show the file and line that was matched: find . -name *.js -print0 | xargs -0 grep -n -H set_up_uploadify This could be rolled into a custom script with file type and arg1 and pattern as arg2.
